name: Escape the Limbo
description:
Escape the Limbo is a procedural platformer game, where you find yourself in a Limbo from which you try to escape by collecting so called Limbos. Every time you play, the game is different. This game was made for the May day 1.0 game jam. Theme: It's procedural. Sub theme: death is not the end.

Credits:

Background Music by penguinmusic from Pixabay: https://pixabay.com/music/upbeat-space-chillout-14194/
